name: USCoreClinicalTestCodes
title: US Core Clinical Test Codes
description: Starter set of clinical test LOINC codes identified in Appendix B in U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) Task Force 2021 HITAC Phase 3 Recommendations Report Letter
copyright: This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org).
